string.name: menu_filter_by_practice_zone
string.translation_description: Filtering alphabets by favourites list

string.name: fav_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Favourite ALphabets' screen where the user can see the list of alphabets that have been added to their favourites.

string.name: alphabet_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the alphabet list screen where the user can see a list of alphabets available to add to their list.

string.name: available
string.translation_description: Text for the header of the alphabet list page indicating the available alphabets for users to choose from.

string.name: alphabet_details_title
string.translation_description: Title for the alphabet details screen where the user can see the details for a specific alphabet.

string.name: add_alphabet
string.translation_description: Button text that prompts user to navigate to the Alphabet List to add alphabets to their empty favourites.

string.name: next_alphabet
string.translation_description: Button text that prompts user to navigate to the next alphabet.

string.name: prev_alphabet
string.translation_description: Button text that prompts user to navigate to the previous alphabet.

string.name: home_alphabet
string.translation_description: Button text that prompts user to navigate to the home page.

string.name: first_alphabet
string.translation_description: Button text that prompts user to navigate to the first alphabet, Aa.

string.name: last_alphabet
string.translation_description: Button text that prompts user to navigate to the las alphabet, Zz.

string.name: added_fav_to_list
string.translation_description: Confirmation text that is shown when a user adds an alphabet to their empty favourites.

string.name: fav_empty
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on the 'Favourites' screen when no alphabets have been added to the user's favourites

string.name: alphabet_date_header
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on each alphabet on the 'Favourites' screen which says the word Added to show date of adding below

string.name: added_date_header
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on each alphabet on the 'Favourites' screen which says the word Last Added to show date of last adding below

string.name: menu_item_share_alphabet
string.translation_description: The label for the Share menu item

string.name: share_text_alphabet
string.translation_description: The default messaged used when sharing a alphabet on SNS, etc.

resources.string: Check out the %s alphabet in the Android Alphabet app

string.name: collection_title
string.translation_description: Title for the photo collection screen

string.name: adding_needs_prefix
string.translation_description: Prefix for the text describing how often a new word must be found. Used in combination with adding_needs_suffix.

item.translation_description: Suffix for the text describing how often an alphabet should be added, singular. Used in combination with adding_needs_prefix: 'Adding needs: every day'.
Suffix for the text describing how often a alphabet should be added, plural. Used in combination with adding_needs_prefix: 'Adding needs: every 8 days'.
Text indicating when the next be word should be practiced, singular. Used in conjunction with last added date. 'September 22, 2022 - practice tomorrow.'.
Text indicating when the the plant should next be watered, plural. Used in conjunction with last watered date. 'September 22, 2022 - practice in 8 days.'.

string.name: abc_alphabet_item_image
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for each of the alphabet images shown in the 'favourites' and 'Alphabet list' screens.

string.name: collection_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the clickable image to navigate to the collection screen

string.name: alphabet_detail_image_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the header / hero image that is show at the top of the alphabet detail screen.
